Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $14000 for this remarkable item. We are confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value we receive for such a high-quality asset. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
